Description:
Manage relationships with external vendors to ensure high-quality and timely execution of marketing programs, and to ensure competitiveness.
Manage various marketing campaigns, such as email, event, or content marketing and coordinate the database and copy scheduling
Continuous tracking and assessment of the campaign performance and providing necessary reports with the metrics in mind.
Synchronized implementation of existing content strategies by coordinating the various marketing methods.Skills
Skills:
Be a self-starter and able to independently move projects forward, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines.
Expertise in managing project management and keen attention to detail.
Capability to look for new ways to improve job accomplishments.
A strong desire to explore possibilities and improve the project.
